## Apple Inc. stock price
Apple Inc. stock price from January 2007 ploted. Zoom in to see stock price movements during a shorter timespan. Yahoo is data source.

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(plotly)
library(quantmod)
apa <- getSymbols("AAPL",src='yahoo')
apple <- data.frame(Date=index(AAPL),coredata(AAPL))
apple <- apple %>% select(1, 5)
names(apple)[2] <- "Stock_price_close_USD"
apple$name <- "Apple"
plot_ly(apple, x = ~Date, y = ~Stock_price_close_USD, type = "scatter", mode = "lines")
```
